nodes.name: Virginia Consumer Data Protection Act (VCDPA)
nodes.description: The Virginia Consumer Data Protection Act (VCDPA) is a comprehensive data privacy law that establishes consumer rights and data protection obligations for businesses operating in Virginia.

nodes.heading: Data protection assessments
nodes.text: Controller must conduct and document DPAs...

nodes.name: Controller
nodes.description: Natural or legal person that determines purpose and means of processing

nodes.name: Processor
nodes.description: Entity processing personal data on behalf of controller

nodes.name: Consumer
nodes.description: Virginia resident acting in individual or household context

nodes.name: Child
nodes.description: Natural person younger than 13 years of age

nodes.name: Parent or Legal Guardian
nodes.description: Parent or legal guardian of a child

nodes.name: Third Party
nodes.description: Person other than consumer controller processor or affiliates

nodes.name: Virginia Attorney General
nodes.description: Sole enforcement authority for VCDPA

nodes.name: Personal Data
nodes.description: Information linked to identified or identifiable natural person

nodes.name: Racial or Ethnic Origin
nodes.description: Personal data revealing racial or ethnic origin

nodes.name: Religious Beliefs
nodes.description: Personal data revealing religious beliefs

nodes.name: Health Diagnosis
nodes.description: Personal data revealing mental or physical health diagnosis

nodes.name: Sexual Orientation
nodes.description: Personal data revealing sexual orientation

nodes.name: Citizenship Status
nodes.description: Personal data revealing citizenship or immigration status

nodes.name: Genetic or Biometric ID
nodes.description: Processing genetic or biometric data for unique identification

nodes.name: Child Data
nodes.description: Personal data collected from known child under 13

nodes.name: Precise Geolocation
nodes.description: Precise geolocation within 1750 feet radius

nodes.name: De-identified Data
nodes.description: Data cannot reasonably be linked to identified person

nodes.name: Access Request
nodes.description: Consumer requests to confirm and access personal data

nodes.name: Correction Request
nodes.description: Consumer requests correction of inaccuracies

nodes.name: Deletion Request
nodes.description: Consumer requests deletion of personal data

nodes.name: Data Portability Request
nodes.description: Consumer requests portable copy in usable format

nodes.name: Opt-Out Targeted Advertising
nodes.description: Consumer opts out of targeted advertising

nodes.name: Opt-Out Sale
nodes.description: Consumer opts out of sale of personal data

nodes.name: Opt-Out Profiling
nodes.description: Consumer opts out of profiling with legal effects

nodes.name: Consent for Sensitive Data
nodes.description: Controller obtains consent for sensitive data processing

nodes.name: Consumer Appeal
nodes.description: Consumer appeals controller refusal to act

nodes.name: DPA Required
nodes.description: Event triggering data protection assessment

nodes.name: Data Minimization
nodes.description: Limit collection to adequate relevant and necessary

nodes.name: Purpose Limitation
nodes.description: Process only for reasonably necessary and compatible purposes

nodes.name: Security Practices
nodes.description: Reasonable administrative technical and physical security

nodes.name: Non-Discrimination
nodes.description: Do not discriminate against consumers exercising rights

nodes.name: Consent Mechanism
nodes.description: Obtain clear affirmative consent for sensitive data

nodes.name: Privacy Notice
nodes.description: Provide accessible clear meaningful privacy notice

nodes.name: Opt-Out Disclosure
nodes.description: Disclose sale and targeted advertising with opt-out

nodes.name: Consumer Request Mechanism
nodes.description: Secure reliable means for submitting requests

nodes.name: Authentication
nodes.description: Authenticate consumer identity commercially reasonable

nodes.name: Appeal Process
nodes.description: Process for consumers to appeal refusal

nodes.name: Processor Contract
nodes.description: Binding contract with processor

nodes.name: DPA Documentation
nodes.description: Conduct and document data protection assessments
AG must provide 30-day notice and cure opportunity
AG may seek penalties up to $7,500 per violation if not cured
AG may seek injunction to restrain violations
AG investigates consumer complaints and violations
AG sends formal notice of violation and requires corrective action
Documented record of VCDPA violation maintained by AG
Consumer files complaint with Virginia Attorney General for investigation
Negotiated settlement between AG and violating entity

nodes.required_elements: Purpose; categories processed; categories shared; benefits and risks; safeguards
nodes.description: Controller must conduct DPA for sale of personal data

nodes.required_elements: Purpose; categories processed; categories shared; benefits and risks; safeguards
nodes.description: Controller must conduct DPA for processing sensitive data

nodes.required_elements: Purpose; categories processed; categories shared; benefits and risks; safeguards
nodes.description: Controller must conduct DPA for targeted advertising

nodes.required_elements: Purpose; categories processed; categories shared; benefits and risks; safeguards
nodes.description: Controller must conduct DPA for profiling with risk of harm

nodes.required_elements: Purpose; categories processed; categories shared; benefits and risks; safeguards
nodes.description: Controller must conduct DPA for heightened-risk processing

nodes.name: Consumer Request Process
nodes.description: Documented procedure for receiving authenticating and responding to consumer rights requests within 45 days

nodes.name: Consumer Authentication
nodes.description: Commercially reasonable authentication method to verify consumer identity for access requests

nodes.name: Access Request Response Template
nodes.description: Standard template and workflow for providing access to personal data in portable format

nodes.name: Correction Request Process
nodes.description: Documented procedure for accepting correcting and confirming corrections to personal data

nodes.name: Deletion Request Process
nodes.description: Documented procedure for receiving and executing deletion requests including notification to service providers

nodes.name: Data Portability Format
nodes.description: Specification for portable usable format to transmit personal data upon consumer request

nodes.name: Opt-Out Request Tracking
nodes.description: System and procedures to track honor and document opt-out requests for targeted advertising sale and profiling

nodes.name: Appeal Handling Process
nodes.description: Documented procedure for receiving and adjudicating consumer appeals of controller refusal to act

nodes.name: Consent Capture Mechanism
nodes.description: Technical specification for capturing storing and managing affirmative consent for sensitive data processing

nodes.name: Data Minimization Audit
nodes.description: Quarterly audit procedure to verify personal data collection is adequate relevant and necessary

nodes.name: Security Practices Assessment
nodes.description: Annual assessment and documentation of administrative technical and physical security safeguards

nodes.name: Privacy Notice Template
nodes.description: Standard template for clear accessible meaningful privacy notices describing processing practices

nodes.name: Opt-Out Disclosure Mechanism
nodes.description: Technical specification for disclosing sale and targeted advertising with easy opt-out option

nodes.name: Processor Agreement Template
nodes.description: Standard data processing agreement containing required statutory obligations and duties

nodes.name: Data Protection Assessment Template
nodes.description: Standard template and process for conducting documenting DPA for sale of personal data

nodes.name: DPA for Sensitive Data Processing
nodes.description: Specific DPA procedure and template for sensitive data processing activities

nodes.name: DPA for Targeted Advertising
nodes.description: DPA procedure for targeted advertising and profiling activities

nodes.name: DPA for Heightened-Risk Processing
nodes.description: DPA procedure for heightened-risk processing activities

nodes.name: De-identification Standard
nodes.description: Technical specification and procedures for de-identifying data per NIST standards

nodes.name: Re-identification Commitment
nodes.description: Public commitment and binding controls to prevent re-identification of de-identified data

nodes.name: Data Minimization Policy
nodes.description: Collect only adequate relevant and necessary data

nodes.name: Consent Management Policy
nodes.description: Obtain consent before processing sensitive data

nodes.name: Consumer Rights Policy
nodes.description: Honor consumer access correction deletion portability opt-out requests

nodes.name: Data Security Policy
nodes.description: Implement reasonable security practices

nodes.name: Transparency and Notice Policy
nodes.description: Provide clear accessible privacy notices

nodes.name: Data Protection Assessment Policy
nodes.description: Conduct and document DPAs for high-risk processing

nodes.name: Consent Collection System
nodes.description: Capture store and track consumer consent

nodes.name: Consumer Request Automation
nodes.description: Automate receipt authentication and response to requests

nodes.name: Opt-Out Request Processing
nodes.description: Process opt-out requests for targeted ad sale profiling

nodes.name: Privacy Notice Management
nodes.description: Generate and publish privacy notices

nodes.name: Personal Data Mapping
nodes.description: Identify and catalog personal data types sources uses

nodes.name: Access Control and Logging
nodes.description: Log and monitor access to personal data

nodes.name: Encryption Implementation
nodes.description: Encrypt personal data at rest and in transit

nodes.name: DPA Execution
nodes.description: System to conduct and document DPAs

nodes.name: Customer Relationship Management
nodes.description: Centralized customer data platform

nodes.name: Consent Management Platform
nodes.description: Capture and track consumer consent

nodes.name: Consumer Request Portal
nodes.description: Self-service portal for consumer requests

nodes.name: Enterprise Data Warehouse
nodes.description: Consolidated repository for analytics

nodes.name: Ad Tech Platform
nodes.description: Tracks consumer activity for targeted advertising

nodes.name: DPA Tracker
nodes.description: System to conduct and maintain DPAs

nodes.name: Consumer Request Handling
nodes.description: Receive authenticate respond to consumer requests

nodes.name: Consent Management
nodes.description: Capture store track consent for sensitive data

nodes.name: Opt-Out Processing
nodes.description: Honor opt-out requests for targeted ad sale profiling

nodes.name: Appeal Handling
nodes.description: Process consumer appeals of controller refusal

nodes.name: DPA Execution
nodes.description: Conduct and document DPAs for high-risk processing

nodes.name: Data Minimization Review
nodes.description: Review and limit personal data collection

nodes.name: Security Practices Implementation
nodes.description: Establish and maintain security practices

nodes.text: Right to rectification of inaccurate personal data
Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)
Right to object to processing including profiling
Processing of special categories of personal data
Principles relating to processing (lawfulness fairness transparency)
Data protection by design and by default
Information to be provided where personal data collected from data subject
Right to know what personal information is collected
Right to deletion of personal information
Right to know categories and specific pieces of personal information
Right to know categories of personal information sold or disclosed
Right to opt-out of sale of personal information
Notice at collection of personal information
Methods for submitting requests and opt-out
Definitions including personal information and sale
Right to limit use and disclosure of sensitive personal information
Right to correct inaccurate personal information
Consent required for collection use or disclosure of sensitive personal information
Identity and access management for individuals and devices
Enable individuals to access their data
Enable individuals to manage processing of their data
Enable individuals to correct delete or port their data
Integrity and confidentiality of personal data
Organizational privacy governance and risk management
Removable media is protected and use restricted
Network monitored to detect anomalous activity
Providing mechanism to modify or withdraw consent
Consumer rights to access correct delete and portability
Consumer rights to access delete and portability
Consumer rights to access correction deletion portability opt-out

nodes.name: 100,000 Consumers Threshold
nodes.description: Controls or processes data of 100,000+ consumers

nodes.name: 25,000 + 50% Revenue Threshold
nodes.description: Controls 25,000+ consumers AND >50% revenue from data sales

nodes.name: State Agencies
nodes.description: State agencies and political subdivisions

nodes.name: GLBA Financial Institutions
nodes.description: Financial institutions under Gramm-Leach-Bliley Act

nodes.name: HIPAA Entities
nodes.description: HIPAA covered entities and business associates

nodes.name: Nonprofit Organizations
nodes.description: Nonprofit organizations exempt under IRS 501(c)

nodes.name: Higher Education
nodes.description: Public and private institutions of higher education

rels.description: Processor processes personal data on behalf of and under instructions of Controller
Processor acts as service provider to Controller for data processing activities
Processor provides services requiring access to personal data controlled by Controller
Processor engages subcontractor with general written authorization from Controller
Processor engages subcontractor with specific prior written authorization from Controller
Processor must impose same data protection obligations on subcontractor via contract
